statements: SELECT * FROM customer_ltv WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT customer_name, lifetime_value FROM customer_ltv WHERE purchase_amount > 1000 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_ltv WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT AVG(lifetime_value) as average_lifetime_value FROM customer_ltv;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount, lifetime_value FROM customer_ltv WHERE customer_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT customer_name, lifetime_value FROM customer_ltv WHERE purchase_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY lifetime_value DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM customer_ltv WHERE purchase_amount > 100 ORDER BY purchase_amount ASC;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date, purchase_amount FROM customer_ltv WHERE lifetime_value > 500 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, lifetime_value FROM customer_ltv WHERE purchase_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, lifetime_value FROM customer_ltv WHERE purchase_date < '2021-06-01' ORDER BY lifetime_value DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, total_purchases_amount FROM customers ORDER BY total_purchases_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, first_purchase_date FROM customers WHERE total_purchases_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, first_purchase_date FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT c.customer_name, cs.segment_name FROM customers c JOIN customer_segments cs ON c.customer_id = cs.segment_id;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, total_purchases_amount FROM customers WHERE total_purchases_amount > 10000;
SELECT customer_name, first_purchase_date FROM customers WHERE first_purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT c.customer_name, s.segment_name FROM customers c INNER JOIN customer_segments s ON c.total_purchases_amount > s.min_profitability AND c.total_purchases_amount < s.max_profitability;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_customers, AVG(total_purchases_amount) AS avg_purchases FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE join_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, lifetime_value FROM customers ORDER BY lifetime_value DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT segment_name, description FROM segments;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE lifetime_value > 1000
SELECT name, email FROM customers ORDER BY join_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, name, lifetime_value FROM customers WHERE join_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 500
SELECT segment_name, description FROM segments
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE total_spent > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, email, last_purchase_date FROM customers ORDER BY last_purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, total_spent FROM customers WHERE first_purchase_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT c.customer_name, p.purchase_amount, p.purchase_category FROM customers c INNER JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE p.purchase_amount > 50;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE total_spent > 1000 ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT c.customer_name, p.purchase_amount, p.purchase_date FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE p.purchase_amount > 500 ORDER BY p.purchase_amount DESC;

SELECT c.customer_name, clv.lifetime_value, cs.segment_name FROM customers c JOIN customer_lifetime_value clv ON c.customer_id = clv.customer_id JOIN customer_segments cs ON clv.segment_id = cs.segment_id;

SELECT customer_name, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_purchase_amount FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name HAVING total_purchase_amount > 2000 ORDER BY total_purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE registration_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT promotions.promotion_name, promotions.discount_amount, customer_segments.segment_name FROM promotions JOIN customer_segments ON promotions.start_date = customer_segments.start_date;
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT customer_name, email, registration_date FROM customers WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC
SELECT customer_name, email, purchase_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id
SELECT * FROM promotions WHERE discount_amount > 0.2 AND start_date <= '2022-06-30'
